div.pre: 2361 Apt, 40 km. N of Aix, 1889 (58) Burial: 3rd-2nd cent. B.C. (Rolland) Contents: 102 AR. In bronze urn Massalia: 13 dr. 2 diob. 87 ob. Disposition: unknown RevArch 14 (1889), pp. 422-3 RBN 1890, p. 535 Blanchet, Trait√©, p. 596, no. 249 Rolland, RN 1959-60, p. 39
